Test Name: Molecular Detection of SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B, and RSV RNA (Real-Time PCR)
Purpose: To accurately detect and differentiate SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A, Influenza B, and RSV RNA for timely clinical diagnosis and reporting.
Equipment: Real-Time PCR Instrument (e.g., Thermo Fisher QuantStudio, BioRad CFX96)
